vikram.connect.com.connect

Class VolleyRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • vikram.connect.com.connect.VolleyRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.volley.Response.Listener<java.lang.String>

    public class VolleyRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.android.volley.Response.Listener<java.lang.String>
    Class crawls Firebase and pulls new data. The data is stored on RAM unless the user decides to persist with data on local db storage Class will also be responsible for assigning the recycler view new data to populate the UI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onResponse(java.lang.String response)
      response of volley request, assign the newly crawled data to respective variables inflate the recycler view by giving its adapter the newly crawled data
